rev.comment: ...and the helmet images here exist separately. If you MUST use them, use those. Not this image. It's just not needed.
rev.diff:
Line 1: Line 1: â
[[Image:Seattle Seahawks Tampa Bay Buccaneers helmets.png|right|thumb|The [[Seattle Seahawks]] and the [[Tampa Bay Buccaneers]] selected the first payers in franchise history]] The '''1976 [[National Football League]] [[Expansion draft]]''' was held on March 30 â 31, [[1976 NFL season|1976]].<ref name=hof>{{cite web |url=http://www.profootballhof.com/history/release.jsp?release_id=1284 |title=1976 NFL Expansion Draft |accessdate=2008-09-24 |publisher=Pro Football Hall of Fame}}</ref> The expansion teams, the [[Seattle Seahawks]] and the [[Tampa Bay Buccaneers]], each selected 39 players from the other 26 NFL teams.<ref name=hof/> When one player was chosen from an existing team, that team was then permitted to protect two additional players.<ref name=hof/> The expansion teams continued until three players had been picked from each of the existing teams.<ref name=hof/>
+
The '''1976 [[National Football League]] [[Expansion draft]]''' was held on March 30 â 31, [[1976 NFL season|1976]].<ref name=hof>{{cite web |url=http://www.profootballhof.com/history/release.jsp?release_id=1284 |title=1976 NFL Expansion Draft |accessdate=2008-09-24 |publisher=Pro Football Hall of Fame}}</ref> The expansion teams, the [[Seattle Seahawks]] and the [[Tampa Bay Buccaneers]], each selected 39 players from the other 26 NFL teams.<ref name=hof/> When one player was chosen from an existing team, that team was then permitted to protect two additional players.<ref name=hof/> The expansion teams continued until three players had been picked from each of the existing teams.<ref name=hof/>
==Seattle Seahawk selections==
==Seattle Seahawk selections==
